userdoc.notice: Emergency pool in degis will keep a reserve vault for emergency usage.         The asset comes from part of the product's income (currently 10%).         Users can also stake funds into this contract manually.         The owner has the right to withdraw funds from emergency pool and it would be passed to community governance.
